text: The Resistance (also known as the #Resistance) began as an American liberal political movement that protests the presidency of Donald Trump. It was established as a grassroots movement on January 19, 2017, and has since grown to include not only Democrats, but Independents and Republicans against Trump. Members of the movement are known for their prolific use of Twitter, especially the "#Resist" hashtag. == See also == * Protests against Donald Trump ==References== Category:2016 United States presidential election Category:2017 establishments in the United States Category:Left-wing politics in the United States Category:Presidency of Donald Trump
title: The Resistance (American political movement)
